name: Knight's Vow
simpleDescription: Partner with an ally to protect each other

passives.name: Sacrifice
passives.effects: While your Worthy ally is tethered to you and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 12% of the pre-mitigation physical physical damage and magic magic damage damage they take to you as the respective damage type. Additionally, you heal for 10% of the post-mitigation damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions.

active.name: Pledge
active.effects: Designate the target allied champion as being Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time. You cannot be designated as Worthy by an ally's Knight's Vow.
